entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebAssemblyPreloader component #51989
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #51988
  • Blazor EventCallback possibility to access delegate #51987
  • Program.cs is not called in Blazor Web App Client project (RC2) #51986
  • Blazor wasm PWA install button (for IOS / Android web app on home screen) #51985
  • MapRazorComponents unexpectedly requires antiforgery middleware #51981
  • InputFile in Blazor SSR #51980
  • [Linux] After creating the Blazor Web App on Visual Studio Code, running it and clicking "Counters/Weather/Home" in the browser list on the left, cannot navigate to the target page. #51979
  • blazor ssr form processing issues #51978
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #51977
  • AddOpenIdConnect is not called in ASP.NET 7 + Angular SPA project. #51972

Closed

  • No documentation or support for projects that use @angular/localize #51859
    Discussions
  • CascadingParameter set in MainLayout.razor doesn't work as expected in .NET 8 #51955
  • Strange message loss when a client sends a message to hub #51853
  • blazor web app does not render properly #48714
    Planning: WebUI
  • Object disposed exception when deserializing an async enumerable in Blazor WASM #51983
  • System.ObjectDisposedException: Cannot access a disposed object. Object name: 'DotNetObjectReference`1'. #51973
  • Perf regression: caching, mvc, updates #51953

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Use working directory as relative directory for project file resolution #51974
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Rename label `help-wanted` to `help wanted` #51982
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Update DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement doc comment #51490
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix construction of AsParameters with default constructor #51637
    Servicing-consider, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.x
  • Show user friendly message for streaming rendering failures #51687
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
